plot outline: Saptami and Pancham are siblings. Dipak is a doctor from a wealthy family who falls for saptami and marries her. But saptami's in laws don't like her cause she is poor and harasses her brother. In the mean time relation grows between Pancham and Champa, a Village girl. Pancham is a singer but losses his voice in a trauma by seeing his sister's hardship. Seeing her brother's condition saptami decides to fight back and regain her honor and respect.
title: Streer Maryada
plot: Saptami and Pancham are siblings. Dipak is a doctor from a wealthy family who falls for saptami and marries her. But saptami's in laws don't like her cause she is poor and harasses her brother. In the mean time relation grows between Pancham and Champa, a Village girl. Pancham is a singer but losses his voice in a trauma by seeing his sister's hardship. Seeing her brother's condition saptami decides to fight back and regain her honor and respect.
